about_the_game:
Nicole has been traumatized by the murder of her mother and father. Haunted by images of a memory she can't recall. Follow Nicole and Gabby's lives as they try and put the pieces together that are tearing at them daily. Something or someone is lurking out in the darkness. Waiting. Help them discover the truth before it is too late.



The game is built on perspectives and choices. To understand the whole story you would need to play through the game at least twice. Simultaneous events occur that give insight to the main story.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.

Contains nudity, use of alcohol and drugs, graphic depictions of vaginal and non-penetrative sexual acts.  Violence and Gore.

name: A World of Wishes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
